thread.section_title: Park Hyatt New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Way beyond any expectations!
thread.title_full: Way beyond any expectations! - Review of Park Hyatt New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Matheus O
title: Way beyond any expectations!
text:
We stayed at the Park Hyatt New York City for one night after having problems at another hotel in the city. It was an amazing experience. Everything was way beyond all our expectations. Rooms are large (something unique in New York City), the service is impeccable, food is simple but delicious and location is perfect. There is absolute nothing I would change.
Room Tip: Central Park views are obstructed but still gorgeous and worth the extra money. See more room tips
